prompt:
I want you to predict the types based on the Ontology for Biomedical Investigations, focusing on biomedical terms and experimental entities. First I want you to see the examples of the train set then I will give you the test set for you to predict.
These are 5 examples:
[FIRST_FIVE_DATASET]
Now I want to give you all [NUM_LABELS] possibles answers:
[LABELS]
Now I will give you the test set and you will just answer each instance with no explanation and in one line for example 'types': ['ANSWER'] Additionally, provide a brief reason (up to 100 words) in the format: 'reason': '...'
